Key Match Events: Jalen Green averaged 27.6 points, shooting 47.7% from the field and 41.2% from the 3-point line in the first five games of January.
Pre-Game Insights: Experts expected the Rockets to at least be a play-in team this season, but they are currently one of the best teams in the NBA.
Post-Match Reflections: The Rockets are currently second in their conference at 25-12 and have already won ten road games, a feat they didn't achieve until March 29th of last season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rockets' turnaround is attributed to the improved play of Jalen Green, who has started to show flashes of his March 2024 performance.
Others: The Rockets' new head coach, Ime Udoka, has emphasized the importance of defense, and Green's overall defense has improved significantly this season.
